aboutMe.name: María del Carmen Farfán Gavilán
aboutMe.description: Junior Programmer with great enthusiasm for both backend and frontend development. I am characterized by my commitment, eagerness to learn, and collaborative approach, always striving to improve and achieve goals together with the team.
aboutMe.title: Web Developer and 2D/3D Animator

experience.details: At Ingenio Triana, I developed robotics projects with data exchange using the MQTT protocol, applying publisher/subscriber architectures for real-time communication. I also created Arduino-based interactive learning projects combining programming and electronics to foster creativity and logic in classrooms.

At Timber Films, I served as the Lead 3D Animator and also contributed as a Concept Artist. I participated in creating VFX in Unity using C#, as well as modeling and texturing 3D assets, contributing to the project's technical and artistic quality.

projects.name: Chapatriste
projects.details: Chapatriste was a project I developed with the Timber Films team, serving as Lead 3D Animator, Concept Artist, and VFX creator in Unity with C#, as well as performing 3D modeling and texturing.

projects.name: Re:Die
projects.details: I participated in the development of the video game Re:Die during a game jam, working as a programmer and VFX artist. The game was created in a short period, focusing on dynamic and fun gameplay.

education.degree: Higher Technical Certificate in Web Application Development
education.details: During the Web Application Development course, I gained strong training in various technologies and programming languages, covering both frontend and backend. I worked with Java, JavaScript, React, HTML, CSS, and SQL, among others.

education.degree: Higher Technical Certificate in 3D Animation for Games and Interactive Environments
education.institution: Business School of the Chamber of Commerce of Seville
education.details: During the 3D Animation, Games, and Interactive Environments program, I acquired knowledge in modeling, animation, and digital design applied to the development of video games and interactive experiences.
